meanings.definition: Receive (money, property, or a title) as an heir.
meanings.sent1: She will be inheriting her grandmother's antique jewelry collection.
meanings.sent2: He is inheriting the family farm after his father's passing.
meanings.sent3: Inheriting the mansion felt like winning the lottery for him.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was inheriting a treasure trove of memories from her late uncle.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of inheriting the family business weighed heavily on his shoulders.
